tokens.text: is a block definition with description, components, and permutations

fields.title: Components
fields.technicalDescription: Block with "geometry" set at "minecraft:geometry.full_block" cannot have a "random_offset"

fields.title: Description
fields.description: Information about the block, must have at minimum an "identifier" and can have also the following optional field "menu_category", "states" and/or "traits"

description: Is a block definition with description, components, and permutations.
